name: Guard Tank
description: A basic tank build for guarding and protecting others from attacks.

name: Magic Offense
description: An offensive magic build that is best used with a full coven of similar members buffing DP and DMP.

name: Magic Support Stacker
description: A supportive magic build used to fill support slots of a Donum-based coven.

name: Thundering Pact Stunner
description: A stun build best used in the Thundering Pact that boosts Wonder Viande stats.

name: Lamp STR Smasher
description: An offensive Aster Crow build utilizing beneficial STR boosts alongside the double lamp attack stats.
